# Special Functions

> Standard library base special math functions.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var special = require( '@stdlib/math/base/special' );
```

#### special

Standard library base special math functions.

``` javascript
var fcns = special;
// returns {...}
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better examples -->

``` javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
var special = require( '@stdlib/math/base/special' );

console.log( getKeys( special ) );
```
